original_title: Slash featuring Myles Kennedy & The Conspirators - Living The Dream Tour
overview: Filmed and recorded at the legendary Hammersmith Apollo in London, Slash Featuring Myles Kennedy and the Conspirators - Living the Dream Tour captures the band incendiary performance in front of a rabid sold out audience. For over two hours they roar through a set featuring the tracks from all four of Slash's solo albums.
title: Slash featuring Myles Kennedy & The Conspirators - Living The Dream Tour
